content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our Customer (IHS Markit) requests several types of Background checks that are needed to be done for all the people on the project. It becomes a standard procedure that is going to be done for all people who cooperate with the Customer.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This is the list of checks that are needed to be performed and some additional information related to it:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":68272,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/97624078-9431-4083-b3a4-1dbab7c859b7/markit14.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/97624078-9431-4083-b3a4-1dbab7c859b7/markit14.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"markit14.JPG\",\"name\":\"markit14.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"97624078-9431-4083-b3a4-1dbab7c859b7\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":891,\"height\":525},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All the checks will be performed mostly by our internal department and/or by the third party. No additional documents will be required. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In order to proceed with mentioned checks, you will be asked to provide the personal data (passport data, Tax ID, Diploma, other info in case of need) will be used. All the employees will be asked to provide the Confirmation/Approve on the support of the check.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
